snippet: Despite missing expectations, the predicted second-quarter results represent an improvement from the first quarter.
abstract: Samsung preliminary report estimates that operating profit likely fell 4 percent to 6.9 trillion won, or around $6.1 billion, in April to June quarter when compared with quarter year earlier; predictions miss analyst expectations despite improvement from first quarter 2015.
lead_paragraph: Despite missing expectations, the predicted second-quarter results represent an improvement from the first quarter.

headline.main: Samsung Shows Another Drop in Profit in Preview of Earnings
headline.print_headline: Samsung’s Second Quarter Falls Short of Expectations
